content: Revenues from our Battery & Energy Products segment were $32.1 million compared to $22.1 million last year, an increase of 45.4% with $7 million of the $10 million variance attributable to Excell and $3 million of net organic growth, comprised of increases of 67.5% in government defense sales and 26.9% in SWE's oil and gas market sales, partially offset by a 17.2% decrease in medical sales due solely to component shortages to fulfil increased demand from a large international medical device OEM.
